analyzed_chunks.name: VoiceTree application test
analyzed_chunks.text: This is a test of the VoiceTree application.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This sub-chunk introduces the VoiceTree application. Since there are no existing nodes, and it doesn't directly relate to the other sub-chunks, it stands alone for now.

analyzed_chunks.name: Create project planning node
analyzed_chunks.text: I want to create a new node about project planning.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This sub-chunk expresses the intention to create a project planning node. The subsequent chunks define steps within project planning, so this chunk sets the context for them.

analyzed_chunks.name: Define project scope
analyzed_chunks.text: The first step is to define the project scope.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This sub-chunk describes the first step in project planning. It directly relates to the 'Create project planning node' sub-chunk as a specific action within that broader topic.

analyzed_chunks.name: Identify key stakeholders
analyzed_chunks.text: The next step is to identify the key stakeholders.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This sub-chunk describes another step in project planning, following the definition of project scope. It's a continuation of the project planning process initiated in 'Create project planning node'.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction to the Project
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so let's start by outlining the project we're about to undertake.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Introduces the beginning of outlining a project.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so let's start by outlining the project we're about to undertake.

integration_decisions.name: Project Goal
integration_decisions.text: Our main goal is to develop a comprehensive data analysis pipeline.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project's main goal is to develop a comprehensive data analysis pipeline.
integration_decisions.content: Our main goal is to develop a comprehensive data analysis pipeline.

integration_decisions.name: Pipeline Components
integration_decisions.text: This pipeline will include data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization components.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The data analysis pipeline will include data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization components.
integration_decisions.content: This pipeline will include data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization components.

integration_decisions.name: Data Collection Methods
integration_decisions.text: For data collection, we'll primarily use web scraping and API integrations.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The primary methods for data collection will be web scraping and API integrations.
integration_decisions.content: For data collection, we'll primarily use web scraping and API integrations.

integration_decisions.name: Cleaning Techniques
integration_decisions.text: Data cleaning will involve handling missing values, removing duplicates, and standardizing formats.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Data cleaning will involve handling missing values, removing duplicates, and standardizing formats.
integration_decisions.content: Data cleaning will involve handling missing values, removing duplicates, and standardizing formats.

integration_decisions.name: Analysis Tools
integration_decisions.text: Our analysis will leverage Python with libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The data analysis will leverage Python with libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn.
integration_decisions.content: Our analysis will leverage Python with libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn.

integration_decisions.name: Visualization Platforms
integration_decisions.text: For visualization, we'll use tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and potentially Tableau for interactive dashboards.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The visualization will use tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and potentially Tableau for interactive dashboards.
integration_decisions.content: For visualization, we'll use tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and potentially Tableau for interactive dashboards.

integration_decisions.name: Project Timeline
integration_decisions.text: We aim to complete this project within the next six months.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project aims to be completed within the next six months.
integration_decisions.content: We aim to complete this project within the next six months.

integration_decisions.name: Team Roles
integration_decisions.text: Each team member will be assigned specific roles and responsibilities throughout the project.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Each team member will be assigned specific roles and responsibilities throughout the project.
integration_decisions.content: Each team member will be assigned specific roles and responsibilities throughout the project.

integration_decisions.name: Regular Meetings
integration_decisions.text: We'll have weekly meetings to track progress and address any challenges.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Weekly meetings will be held to track progress and address any challenges.
integration_decisions.content: We'll have weekly meetings to track progress and address any challenges.

results.transcript_text: Another thing I will have to do is start reaching out to investors to see what next steps they would recommend for me. I should talk to Austin's dad first.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so we're going to talk about how to use the new AI tool.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Introduces the topic of how to use the new AI tool.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so we're going to talk about how to use the new AI tool.

integration_decisions.name: Accessing the Tool
integration_decisions.text: First, you'll need to access the tool through the company portal.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Explains that the first step is to access the AI tool through the company portal.
integration_decisions.content: First, you'll need to access the tool through the company portal.

integration_decisions.name: Login Credentials
integration_decisions.text: Use your standard login credentials.
integration_decisions.content: Use your standard login credentials.

integration_decisions.name: Tool Interface Overview
integration_decisions.text: Once you're in, you'll see the main interface with several options.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Describes that the main interface with several options will be visible after logging in.
integration_decisions.content: Once you're in, you'll see the main interface with several options.

integration_decisions.name: Text Input Area
integration_decisions.text: The primary area is the text input box where you'll enter your prompts.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Identifies the text input box as the primary area for entering prompts.
integration_decisions.content: The primary area is the text input box where you'll enter your prompts.

integration_decisions.name: Prompt Engineering Importance
integration_decisions.text: It's important to craft your prompts carefully to get the best results.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Emphasizes the importance of carefully crafting prompts for optimal results.
integration_decisions.content: It's important to craft your prompts carefully to get the best results.

integration_decisions.name: Example Prompt
integration_decisions.text: For example, instead of saying 'Summarize this,' try 'Provide a concise summary focusing on the key points and implications'.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Provides an example of a well-crafted prompt for summarizing text.
integration_decisions.content: For example, instead of saying 'Summarize this,' try 'Provide a concise summary focusing on the key points and implications'.

integration_decisions.name: Output Options
integration_decisions.text: Below the input box, you'll find options for different output formats.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: States that options for different output formats are located below the input box.
integration_decisions.content: Below the input box, you'll find options for different output formats.

integration_decisions.name: Supported Formats

integration_decisions.content: These include text, JSON, and CSV.

integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Explains that the processing time depends on the complexity of the task.
integration_decisions.content: Processing time will vary depending on the complexity of the task.

results.transcript_text: To be able to start reaching out to investors, I will first have to polish my POC. This involves refining the user interface, improving the summarization quality, and making sure the application is robust and easy to use. I'll also need to prepare a compelling pitch deck and presentation.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction to the Project
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so the project that I'm working on is a personal knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Introduces the project as a personal knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so the project that I'm working on is a personal knowledge graph.

integration_decisions.name: Purpose of the Knowledge Graph
integration_decisions.text: And the idea is that I want to be able to, you know, ingest information and then be able to ask questions of that information.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The purpose of the knowledge graph is to ingest information and answer questions about it.
integration_decisions.content: And the idea is that I want to be able to, you know, ingest information and then be able to ask questions of that information.

integration_decisions.name: Current Ingestion Method
integration_decisions.text: So right now, I'm doing that by taking notes as I'm reading books or watching videos.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The current method for ingesting information involves taking notes while reading books or watching videos.
integration_decisions.content: So right now, I'm doing that by taking notes as I'm reading books or watching videos.

integration_decisions.name: Note-Taking Process
integration_decisions.text: And then I'm summarizing those notes and putting them into a markdown file.
integration_decisions.content: And then I'm summarizing those notes and putting them into a markdown file.

integration_decisions.name: Markdown File Structure
integration_decisions.text: And the markdown file has a specific structure.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The markdown files used for storing notes have a specific structure.
integration_decisions.content: And the markdown file has a specific structure.

integration_decisions.name: YAML Frontmatter
integration_decisions.text: It has YAML front matter.
integration_decisions.content: It has YAML front matter.

integration_decisions.name: YAML Frontmatter Details
integration_decisions.text: And the YAML front matter has a title, a URL, a description, and a few other things.
integration_decisions.content: And the YAML front matter has a title, a URL, a description, and a few other things.

integration_decisions.name: Main Content Format
integration_decisions.text: And then the main content of the file is just in a plain text format.
integration_decisions.content: And then the main content of the file is just in a plain text format.

integration_decisions.name: Current Limitations
integration_decisions.text: So that's how I'm doing it right now, but it's not ideal.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Acknowledges that the current note-taking process is not ideal.
integration_decisions.content: So that's how I'm doing it right now, but it's not ideal.

integration_decisions.name: Desired Improvements
integration_decisions.text: I want to be able to ingest PDFs and other types of files.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The desired improvement is to ingest PDFs and other file types.
integration_decisions.content: I want to be able to ingest PDFs and other types of files.

integration_decisions.name: Problem with Current System
integration_decisions.text: I don't want to have to manually take notes on everything.
integration_decisions.content: I don't want to have to manually take notes on everything.
